title: Save up to 60% on the Razer Kishi V2 Pro!
description: It's on its lowest price ever! The post Save up to 60% on the Razer Kishi V2 Pro! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: It's on its lowest price ever!
text: As far as gaming peripherals are concerned, Razer is definitely one of the go-to brands on the market right now, and not just for PC or console gaming – the manufacturer also makes some pretty darn good accessories for mobile gaming, such as the impressive Razer Kishi V2 Pro, which is on sale at the moment. Designed for use with smartphones, the Kishi V2 Pro packs all the controls you need for your mobile games and streaming services, so it’s able to work with platforms such as Xbox Cloud gaming. It features built-in haptics, 3.5mm audio support, analog triggers, and programmable buttons as well. It also works with a ton of differently-sized devices, and even comes with support for pass-through charging. html:
As far as gaming peripherals are concerned, Razer is definitely one of the go-to brands on the market right now, and not just for PC or console gaming – the manufacturer also makes some pretty darn good accessories for mobile gaming, such as the impressive Razer Kishi V2 Pro, which is on sale at the moment.

Designed for use with smartphones, the Kishi V2 Pro packs all the controls you need for your mobile games and streaming services, so it’s able to work with platforms such as Xbox Cloud gaming. It features built-in haptics, 3.5mm audio support, analog triggers, and programmable buttons as well. It also works with a ton of differently-sized devices, and even comes with support for pass-through charging.
